cause.description:
Spread Awareness of How U N F A I R The Cruelty Truly Is.
Get Your Community To Help The Fight. You Could Help Save Thousands Of Animals Lives. Don't Forget To Wear Orange For National ASPCA Day!
1. The Grains Used to feed the animals, that are used for meat, could be used to feed starving children in 3rd world countries
2. Animals scream when they feel pain.
3. Animals cry, just like you do.
4. To Stop Puppy Mills.
5. What Happens When They Eat All The Animals? Do They Go For Out Pets?
cause.mission: Spread Awareness of How U N F A I R Animal Cruelty Truly Is.
cause.name: Animal Cruelty is Wrong
